common.signInToAccount: Sign in to your account to continue your IELTS journey

hero.joinStudents: Join over 10,000 successful students who achieved their target scores with our comprehensive study and practice platform.
hero.personalizedLearning: Personalized learning with advanced AI technology
hero.realisticSimulations: Realistic test simulations for all IELTS modules
hero.aiAnalytics: AI-powered analytics to monitor your improvements in real-time
hero.instantEvaluations: Get instant evaluations for speaking and writing tasks

introduction.masterAllSkills: Master all skills with a high-quality
introduction.trainingProgram: training program tailored to your goals
introduction.learningEasy: Learning a foreign language is easy with a comprehensive, personalized Study & Test Preparation plan designed specifically for your needs.
introduction.listeningDesc: Enhance your listening skills with expert feedback. Improve your comprehension and response time with every lesson!
introduction.readingDesc: Master reading comprehension strategies. Learn to analyze complex texts and answer questions with precision and confidence.
introduction.writingDesc: Build a solid foundation from the basics. Practice writing with AI and see noticeable progress with each lesson.
introduction.speakingDesc: Communicate flexibly with highly practical topics. Practice and receive corrections in various real-world scenarios.
introduction.readyToImprove: Ready to improve your IELTS score?
introduction.takeFreeAssessment: Take a free assessment test to see your current level

course.aiPoweredSystem: Our AI-powered system creates a customized roadmap based on your current level and target score.
course.workingOnCreating: We're working on creating the perfect combo courses for your level range.

footer.description: Ielts is the leading IELTS preparation platform, helping students achieve their target scores through innovative technology and expert guidance.
footer.stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest courses
footer.getExclusiveOffers: Get exclusive offers, test preparation tips, and updates on our courses directly to your inbox.

testimonials.remarkableSuccess: Our students have achieved remarkable success in their IELTS journey. Here's what they have to say about their experience with our courses.
testimonials.joinCommunity: Join our community of successful IELTS test-takers

sponsor.proudToBeSupported: We are proud to be supported by leading educational institutions and organizations committed to quality education. Their collaboration strengthens our mission to provide the best learning experience for your success.
sponsor.joinOurNetwork: Join our network of educational partners and help your students achieve their language learning goals. Our partnership program offers numerous benefits and resources to support your institution.
sponsor.accessToPremium: Access to premium IELTS preparation materials
sponsor.priorityPlacement: Priority placement for your students in our courses
sponsor.interestedInExploring: Interested in exploring partnership opportunities? Fill out our simple form and our partnership team will get back to you within 48 hours.
sponsor.partnershipQuote: The partnership with this IELTS preparation platform has significantly elevated the quality of our language training programs.
